definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: resting-place, state, or condition of rest;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ge 8:9 + 4 t.; cstr. [[מְנוֹחַ]] 1Ch 6:16; pl. sf. 2 fs. [[מְנוּחָָיְכִי]] Ps 116:7 (Ges:§ 91 l);—
resting-place [[לְכַף רֶגֶל]] Ge 8:9 (J), cf. De 28:65, La 1:3; Is 34:14 (cf. also [[מְנֻחָה]] Ge 49:15).
rest, repose of soul Ps 116:7 (pl. abstr. vel intens.); condition of rest and security attained by marriage Ru 3:1.
with force of inf. (cf. Aram. inf. c. [[מ]] pref.) [[מִמְּנוֹחַ הָאָרוֹן]] 1Ch 6:16 from the coming to rest of the ark.
